snippet: Premier Wen Jiabao of China on Sunday called for the government to become more aggressive in using fiscal and monetary tools to respond to a slowing economy.
abstract: Chinese Premier Wen Jiabao calls for the government to become more aggressive in using fiscal and monetary tools to respond to a slowing economy; largely attributes the slowdown to weak demand from overseas.
lead_paragraph: Premier Wen Jiabao of China on Sunday called for the government to become more aggressive in using fiscal and monetary tools to respond to a slowing economy.

headline.seo: Chinese Premier Warns of ‘Downward Pressure’ on Economy
headline.main: Chinese Premier Urges Action to Spur Economy
headline.print_headline: Chinese Premier Urges Action to Spur Economy
